topics.title: Why is the number of peers not the same as me when I visit a proxy?
topics.body: Right now I am connected to 16 peers but when I visit this proxy: http://zero.network:43110/1EU1tbG9oC1A8jz2ouVwGZyQ5asrNsE4Vr, I see 30 peers..

2@2.body: ZeroNet Rocks!! (I list all the sites I am currently aware of) http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JF4oezBUFMCbbct1uUnXHf4y3W3grUsXP

1@10.body: Unfortunately I don't have much time to contribute but I love the wiki idea! I hope you guys can make it a reality.
But by the way, I was not able to post a comment here because it said port is closed so I tried to download your upnp_punch fix and it worked! :)

1@39.body: You can visit my site where I list all the ZeroNet sites I am aware of: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JF4oezBUFMCbbct1uUnXHf4y3W3grUsXP
